title: GraphEvolutionProposal
description: A proposal to evolve a flow graph based on EXTEND_GRAPH routing events. Used by Flow 7 (Wisdom) to suggest improvements that appear in the Flow Studio UI.

source_event.description: The EXTEND_GRAPH event ID that triggered this proposal

proposal_type.description: Type of graph evolution being proposed

description.description: Human-readable description of the proposed change

json_patch.description: RFC 6902 JSON Patch operations to apply to the target flow graph

path.description: JSON Pointer path to the target location

value.description: The value to add/replace (required for add/replace operations)

confidence.description: Confidence score (0.0 to 1.0) based on evidence strength

rationale.description: Detailed explanation of why this change is recommended

evidence.description: List of evidence sources (file paths, run IDs, event IDs)

source_run_id.description: The run ID that generated this proposal

pattern_count.description: Number of times this pattern was observed

status.description: Current proposal status in its lifecycle

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when proposal was created

reviewed_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when proposal was reviewed

reviewed_by.description: Who reviewed the proposal (human or system identifier)
